long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is for those who wish CTT (click-to-tweet) links were a bit more.... automatic. This will automatically submit any tweets that are loaded into the twitter.com/intent/post page, which is the page that is loaded by CTT links. This program still requires you to be logged in to twitter and to manually click the links you wish to tweet.

If this extensions doesn't work, please clear your Twitter data in Chrome (chrome://settings/content/all)
